MONDAY Aug PERIOD   HealthDay News  Women who have larger breasts tend to exercise less or less intensely according to a new study that suggests having breast reduction surgery could be a game changer PERIOD

Australian researchers looking at exercise participation for women in this category called for more accessible publicly funded breast reduction and other interventions PERIOD

The study used survey results from nearly  women who were in the involved in the Parkrun program which promotes 5K running and walking events PERIOD Participants were in Australia England and South Africa PERIOD

Women with bigger breasts reported that reducing their breast size would improve their exercise performance and frequency PERIOD And among the survey participants the  women who had already undergone breast reduction surgery said they lead healthier and more active lifestyles PERIOD

Women who had undergone breast reduction reported increased overall frequency enjoyment and willingness to exercise in a group said lead author Dr PERIOD Claire Baxter a clinical registrar in reconstructive surgery at the Flinders Medical Centre in Bedford Park Australia PERIOD

Our study found that breast size affects exercise habits and that breast reduction surgery changes their willingness to exercise she said in a Flinders news release PERIOD

The study promotes the importance of regular exercise for weight and ischemic heart disease and also points out barriers for Australian Government subsidies for reduction mammoplasty PERIOD

As well as the need for patients to have macromastia enlarged breasts experiencing pain in the neck of shoulder region there are a number of statebased requirements for breast reduction to be performed said study coauthor Dr PERIOD Nicola Dean an associate professor at Flinders University PERIOD

For example there are body mass index BMI restrictions in Queensland Victoria and Tasmania which can lead to wait times of  months or more Dean said in the release PERIOD In the U.K. breast reduction surgery via the National Health Service varies across locations resulting in a postcode lottery as breast reduction is considered a lower priority procedure. the study considered comparisons between 5K competition times and bra size PERIOD The BREASTQ study also looked at cup size satisfaction levels which showed more selfsatisfaction with AA A B and C cup sizes than DD E F G and H or greater PERIOD

Life satisfaction and happiness were also significantly related to bra size with cup sizes greater than E reporting lower mean satisfaction PERIOD

The benefits of breast reduction surgery need more awareness and academic support Baxter said PERIOD

Study findings were published in the September issue of the journal JPRAS Open PERIOD

More information

The U.S PERIOD Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has more on overcoming barriers to physical activity PERIOD

SOURCE Flinders University news release Aug PERIOD
